nuhker

Class ParseGSB

  • java.lang.Object
    • nuhker.ParseGSB

  • public class ParseGSB
extends java.lang.Object
    GSB - Google Safe Browsing - a reputation service to indicate whether aninternet site is clean or contaminated by the malware. This particular exercise ignores dates; "listed on GSB" means - has been contaminated by malware within last 90 days".
    Author:
    coder037@xyz.ee

    • Method Detail

      • isNonsense

        public static boolean isNonsense(java.lang.String suspect)
        The method eliminates Google promo links from actual data. There are 4 previously known links. We compare the argument with these. On the first found, break the cycle and return a signal to the calling program
        Parameters:
        suspect - - a link to discard as not a valid data
        Returns:
        boolean decision whether to discard the argument

      • asn2Colon

        static java.lang.String asn2Colon(java.lang.String source)
        A formal conversion method 12345 -> AS:12345. Several checks and consequential format conversions are included to be VERY SURE about our assumptions how Google uses its data at GSB
        Parameters:
        source - The number or an ASN in numeric form (12345)
        source -
        Returns:
        this ASN with "AS:" prepended -> AS:12345 to be directly usable against GSB

      • as2ASN

        static java.lang.String as2ASN(java.lang.String source)
        A formal conversion method AS:12345 -> 12345. Several checks and consequential format transformations included to be VERY SURE about our assumptions how Google uses its data at GSB.
        Parameters:
        source - The number or an ASN in numeric form (12345)
        source -
        Returns:
        Google preferred AS:12345 format converted to an int number 12345

      • badReputation

        static java.lang.String[] badReputation(java.lang.String source)
        This is the most important method in this class which is axial to the whole package. A network resource is checked against Google SafeBrowsing Interface.
        Parameters:
        source - an FQDN or URL or ASN (AS:12345) to be checked
        Returns:
        a String[] array containing references to the badness

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method is mostly kept here for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        args - none expected
